casebody.data:
State
v.
Bobby Frederick Walls, Jr. 120P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

*18Justin M. Hampton, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Bobby Frederick Walls, Jr., For Walls, Bobby Frederick.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of April 2016 by Defendant-Appellant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
